name: The Depths (itch) (HangLang)
description:
A platformer built around utilizing different skills you find in the cavern you explore, enhance your enchanted spirit mask to plunge the depths and gather the fragments of light!

Made for Gotm Jam 4, Enchanted Item.

Pay attention to the text boxes, they give you hints and controls for how to proceed. You can navigate through most of the cavern with different skills, experiment!

Literally my first ever completed and uploaded game, more of a proof of concept than high quality, but hey, it works!
